meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>go beyond</kanji> your <kanji>rights</kanji>, you are going too far. You're doing what you're not supposed to do, and you're overstepping your authority.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
